price: Lakini wakamuuwa, na wakawa wenye kujuta.
footnotes: Wakamchinja ngamia, kinyume na walivyo wafikiana na Swaleh. Kwa hivyo wakastahiki kuwashukia adhabu, wakawa ni wenye kujuta kwa kitendo chao hicho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
